column1: #text=While I was riding my bike I accidentally ran over a nail .
#text=My bike tire had an inner tube , and I had an extra one in my basement .
#text=I got the extra inner tube and went to work .
#text=In order to fix my tire , I had to pry the rubber outer tire out of the wheel 's metal rim .
#text=I got a screwdriver and inserted it between the metal and rubber , lifting the rubber out .
#text=I went around the rim that way taking the tire out of the rim .
#text=Once it was out , I was able to pull the broken inner tube out .
#text=As I 'd figured , there was a big hole in it from the nail .
#text=I put the old inner tube aside and got the new one .
#text=There 's a part on the tube where a valve comes out .
#text=That 's where you attach a pump to fill the tube with air .
#text=I put this valve through the hole in the rim that it 's supposed to stick through .
#text=Then I went around the rim squeezing the inner tube into the tire .
#text=Once I had the inner tube in place , I went around the rim again pushing the outer part of the tire back into the rim .
#text=That was hard work , but I finally managed it .
#text=Once that was done , I got out my bike pump , fitted it to the inner tube 's valve , and filled the new tire with air .
#text=Soon my tire was completely repaired and I was able to ride again !
